bibl.title: M.L. WEST and W.E.H. COCKLE, R.A. COLES, D. MONTSERRAT, J.D. THOMAS, with contributions by J.L. CALVO MARTÍNEZ, D. COLOMO, R. HÜBNER, D. HUGHES, N. LITINAS, K. LUCHNER, U. SCHLAG, T. SCHMIDT, P. SCHUBERT, I.A. SPARKS, J. SPOONER, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LXV (Nos 4442-4493). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 85.)
bibl.note: P. Oxy. LXV, 4442-4493. - I. Theological Texts (4442-4449). - II. Literary Texts (4450-4460). - III. Texts with Musical Notation (4461-4467). - IV. Magic, Religion and Astrology (4468-4477). - V. Documentary Texts (4478-4493).

HASLAM M.W., A. JONES, F. MALTOMINI, M.L. WEST and W.E.H. COCKLE, R.A. COLES, D. MONTSERRAT, J.D. THOMAS, with contributions by J.L. CALVO MARTÍNEZ, D. COLOMO, R. HÜBNER, D. HUGHES, N. LITINAS, K. LUCHNER, U. SCHLAG, T. SCHMIDT, P. SCHUBERT, I.A. SPARKS, J. SPOONER, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LXV (Nos 4442-4493). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 85.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1998, 8°, xii-212 pp. et XX pll., dont 6 dépl. ISBN 0-85698-130-3.
